feed.title: Scrypted Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Scrypted: v0.129.0
entry.content:
Commits

  • 1e89594: Fix path in comment (#1694) (Simon Marty) #1694
  • 75f90b7: postrelease (Koushik Dutta)
  • d0007fc: postbeta (Koushik Dutta)
  • 266d5bf: Update bug_report.md (Koushik Dutta)
  • 2b9c295: Update bug_report.md (Koushik Dutta)
  • 941ea7f: Update bug_report.md (Koushik Dutta)
  • publish (Koushik Dutta)
  • improve abi/server change detection (Koushik Dutta)
  • f56cef1: postbeta (Koushik Dutta)
  • publish new ui with lxc-docker update fix (Koushik Dutta)
  • 1478684: Update install-nvidia-container-toolkit.sh (Koushik Dutta)
  • add Linux arm64 runner to tests (#1696) #1696 (Brett Jia)
  • 780182b: fix npm-install.sh (Koushik Dutta)
  • add ERI-K104-P4 to the list of NVRs that doesn't support channel cap checks (#1698) #1698 (George Talusan)
  • publish (Koushik Dutta)
  • 81b0019: Merge branch 'main' of github.com:koush/scrypted (Koushik Dutta)
  • publish (Koushik Dutta)
  • fixup potential unhandled errors in sdk fork (Koushik Dutta)
  • 6e6898c: common/rebroadcast: change rtp packet size to 32000 since that is what is supported on darwin for some reason (Koushik Dutta)
  • 520c6a6: Merge branch 'main' of github.com:koush/scrypted (Koushik Dutta)
  • Buttons interface (Koushik Dutta)
  • e1efde3: postbeta (Koushik Dutta)
  • PressButtons (Koushik Dutta)
  • publish button support (Koushik Dutta)
  • Fix missing buttons (Koushik Dutta)
  • cleanup launch.json (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix build (Koushik Dutta)
  • improve StorageSettings deviceFilter (Koushik Dutta)
  • publish (Koushik Dutta)
  • update underlying doorbird api package (#1705) #1705 (r3dDoX)
  • publish (Koushik Dutta)
  • moved humidity settings to common and added characteristics to expose settings Home Assistant (#1699) #1699 (Nick Berardi)
  • fixup exports, publish (Koushik Dutta)

entry.title: New release for Scrypted: v0.133.0
